name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 399 Morning Temperature Check Before Work
description:
This proof documents the first operational action of the day at MaMeeFarm™ on 28 December 2025:
an on-site environmental measurement recorded before any physical work began.

The image shows a temperature and humidity display mounted against a brick wall, capturing real-time field data directly from the farm environment.
Weather conditions at the time of recording were clear sky and strong sunlight, indicating stable daytime conditions.

This record serves as a baseline environmental reference for the day’s activities, following the DGCP principle of capturing reality before intervention.
